Program Description: Rebate up to $200 for insulation and air sealing
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Insulation R-value must meet the U.S. Department of Energy recommended ratings: Attic – R49 – and exterior wall – R13. Attic insulation must include bypass air sealing.
Contractor Restrictions: Work must be performed by a Colorado Contractor. Do-it-yourself work does not qualify.
Other Restrictions:
• This rebate is for retrofit applications only and does not apply to new construction.
• This rebate applies to living quarters only. No garages.
